records.Name: Backpack with gear
records.Description: Meet the pack that does it all. The Flex Capacitor family of packs feature adjustable volume to handle both short and long hauls, and a Y flex suspension system that carries above their weight class.

records.Name: Mens Euro Hiker Boots
records.Description: There's no better (or more handsome) boot for warmer-weather hikes and everyday adventures. Our classic leather Euro Hiker boots are cushiony and built to grip terrain, whether it's a rocky trail, a shag carpet or a city sidewalk.

records.Name: Far Out Hiking Backpack
records.Description: Gear up for your next big hike with the JanSport Far Out 55L Hiking Backpack. Constructed with ripstop polyester material, this backpack withstands the wear and tear from hiking in the elements. The sizeable main compartment gives you plenty of storage space for your gear, including a full-size sleeping bag. The padded air-mesh harness system provides breathable comfort, and the trekking pole and ice axe attachment points allow you to safely carry all of your supplies.

records.Name: Climbing Helmet/Light
records.Description: Comfortable enough to wear all day and in any conditions, the C.A.M.P. USA Storm helmet provides necessary protection for any type of climbing or mountaineering. Includes light.

records.Name: Basic Hiking Helmet Set
records.Description: Co-molded foam with low-profile, lightweight polycarbonate shell. One-handed adjustment dial with adjustable chin strap. Clips for headlamp

records.Name: Ice Tools
records.Description: The adjustable FlickLockÂ® pommel acts as a secondary grip position for ice climbing and cragging and easily slides up the shaft for choking up on low-angle snow slopes.

records.Name: Ice screws
records.Description: Our fastest placing ice screws with advanced tooth geometry and complete stainless steel construction, Express Ice Screws feature large, color-coded crank knobs for incredibly fast placements.

records.Name: Manatee Kayak
records.Description: kayak is super-stable, fun, maneuverable and now even more affordable. Plus, it's loaded with features typically seen on more expensive kayaks, including padded seats and adjustable foot rests.

records.Name: 10-foot Kayak
records.Description: Our kayak is the perfect size for one adult, you could even bring along plenty of extra gear without overloading it.
